hibernate-mapping.query: select p from MappedProperty p where p.MapProperty.Id = :mappedPropertyId or p.TargetMappedProperty.Id = :mappedPropertyId
select p from MappedProperty p where p.QueryProperty.Id = :queryPropertyId
select mp.DisplayFormat from MappedProperty mp where mp.DisplayFormat is not null and mp.DisplayFormat != '' and mp.TargetProperty.TypeName like :displayFormatDataType group by mp.DisplayFormat
select p from MappedProperty p where p.ProcedureProperty.Id = :procedurePropertyId
select p from MappedProperty p where p.TargetProperty.Id = :propertyId
select v from View v where v.RequestMap.Id = :propertyMapId or v.ResponseMap.Id = :propertyMapId
select v from ViewNode v where v.ViewMap.Id = :propertyMapId
select v from ViewAction v where v.ViewToActionMap.Id = :propertyMapId
select a from Action a where a.RequestMap.Id = :propertyMapId or a.ResponseMap.Id = :propertyMapId
select s from ServiceMethod s where s.RequestMap.Id = :propertyMapId or s.ResponseMap.Id = :propertyMapId
select u from UXAction u where u.RequestMap.Id = :propertyMapId
select d from DataSource d where d.RequestMap.Id = :propertyMapId or d.ResponseMap.Id = :propertyMapId
select v from View v where v.VisualTreeXml like :propertyMapId
